#summary GEToolStrip control notes
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The GEToolStrip control intergrates with the GEWebBrowser to provide controls for the basic options in the Google Earth Plugin. 


= Details =

The GEToolStrip inherits from the standard [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.forms.toolstrip.aspx System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip] control class


== Constructor == 

_GEToolStrip_ *GEToolStrip*()<br><br>
Initializes a new instance of the GEToolStrip class. 

== Public properties == 

_bool_ *ShowNavigationItems*<br><br>Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Navigation items are visible

_bool_ *ShowLayersDropDown*<br><br>Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Layers drop down is visible

_bool_ *ShowOptionsDropDown*<br><br>Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Options drop down is visible

_bool_ *ShowViewDropDown*<br><br>Gets or sets a value indicating whether the View drop down is visible

== Public methods ==

_void_ *SetPluginInstance*(_object_ ge)<br><br>Set the plugin instance for the control to work with

_void_ *SetDocumentInstance*(_HtmlDocument doc)<br><br>Set the html document for the control to work with
